summary: A late night talk show host masterminds an elaborate scheme to save his canceled show and avenge his wife's affair, entangling an eclectic collection of tinsel towners in the process.
cast: Whitney Able|Tom Arnold|Jordan Belfi|Sandra Hess|Dulé Hill|Kip Pardue|Evan Peters|Jack Plotnick|Johnny Messner|Kevin Nealon|Bob Sapp|Christopher Titus|Steve Vinovich|Nora Zehetner|Lisa Arturo|Stephen Keys|Jason Cottle|Adam Gregor|Vlad Schiau|Ed Ackerman|C.J. Byrnes|Dimitri Diatchenko|Donna Pieroni|Michael Healey|Bill Lee Brown|Jeff Whalen|Candice Coke|Edie Dearing|James Patrick Stuart|Navia Nguyen|Joelle Carter|Claire Coffee|Cisco Reyes|Ray Klein|Chris McNair|Joseph Fatale|Robert Linwood Doak III|Wilbur Mullett|Travis Ellis|Nicole Simone|Chris Hodge|Charlie Parrish|John Jabaley|David Alan Graf|Natalie Lawrence|Chris Vandam|David Heim|Brian Sommers|Ellina Adel|Rick Mattoon|Don Abernathy|Rossie Cottrell|Edward James Gage|Reedy Gibbs|Mueen Jahan|Julio Leal|Shannon McGann|Bob Sattler|Christian Sinclair|Kaily Smith Westbrook
title: Remarkable Power
